updateMorePara.text: Our news section is reserved for our client readers who want to learn more about the news within the company. As a reader you should expect to see weekly and monthly updates on new salon openings, events, and product releases. Sit back, and enjoy the reading!

soinsKarismaPara.text: At Soins Karismä, our priority is to make a positive impact in our community. That is why we have developed a business model focused on the needs of the community.

salonsPara.text: On January 23, we opened our first salon in the city of Montreal, located at 9535 Bd Lacordaire Montreal (St-Leonard) Quebec, H1R 2B6 . We are proud to report that we have a salon run 100% by the Soins Karismä team.
